about.title: about me
about.body:
Hi!ðŸ‘‹  I'm James.

I'm a front-end developer currently working as a principal developer building great Shopify sites and working on internal tooling at WeMakeWebsites.

I love working with Javascript, Vue, and React, solving problems and constantly learning.

When I'm not developing I'm drinking coffee, stand-up paddleboarding, playing video games (I enjoy a good metroidvania) and getting out hiking the countryside.
